thread.title: Thunder fans are chanting 'Cupcake' at Kevin Durant. Here's why.
thread.title_full: Thunder fans are chanting 'Cupcake' at Kevin Durant. Here's why.

author: Hector Diaz
title: Thunder fans are chanting 'Cupcake' at Kevin Durant. Here's why.
text: Thunder fans are chanting 'Cupcake' at Kevin Durant. Here's why. Oklahoma City brought cupcakes for Durant’s return! Rec Thunder fans are embracing the cupcakes! It started off as a Russell Westbrook Instagram post the day Kevin Durant announced he would leave the Thunder for the Golden State Warriors, but now it’s a battle cry (and an adorable costume ). Back when Westbrook and Durant were teammates, they would poke fun of Thunder players who were soft by calling them cupcakes. But now, fans have shown up in cupcake shirts. They’re also holding signs and one of them has a giant cupcake painted on his belly. It started off with a few die-hards in the first quarter. But when the Golden State Warriors got a considerable lead in the second quarter, all of Chesapeake Energy Arena chanted “Cupcake” at Kevin Durant. It’s deafening, and it’s making us a little hungry too. Next Up In ##Lookit
